About me

Hi there, I'm Chris. I'm a final year student of the Higher Diploma in Computing at ATU Sligo - just down the road from my native Roscommon. I'm currently based in Dublin where I work as a Protocol Expert for a social media company.
I've always been fascinated by technology and creating things, which led me to pursue online courses on platforms like Udemy a few years ago. Through my studies, I've gained strong experience in languages like C#, Python, HTML, CSS, Javascript and SQL. I really enjoy learning new things, so I picked up SASS/SCSS to make this website.

When I'm not working or studying away, I like to go to gigs and music festivals, travel to new places, and annoy my friends with fun facts!

Now I'm looking for real-life experience in the IT field, where I can apply my knowledge and continue to grow my skills. If you want to know more about my skills —and hopefully hire me!— please don't hesitate to reach out.
